Description: You may now build buildings.
You may now build buildings.
You may now build buildings.

At each round start before Endgame, player with the most soldiers places Army token on any card in a purchase row. Anyone who takes that card must pay this person 1 Resource Card. In a tie, nobody places the token.

You may trash 1 Grain for any 1 Resource, any number of times.

You may trash 1 Animal for any 1 Resource, any number of times.

Once per turn, you may trash 1 card in your hand or 1 Resource card on your tableau to Climb a Ladder 1 space.

You may only play this card before playing an Engine. This card has no special ability.

You may substitute 2 different Resources for 1 of any Resource, any number of times.
When played, you may look at the midgame cards set aside in the box.
You may spend an action to trash 1 Food for 1 Climb. May be part of a chain.

Play immediately. Once per turn, if you use the Chain Rule to play or steal 3 cards in one action, you may climb a ladder.
Play immediately. Once per turn, if you use the Chain Rule to play or steal 3 cards in one action, you may draw a Special card.
Upon playing, retrieve any Trashed card and play it immediately without prerequisites.
Play immediately. You may only play this card if you have no Army. You are not impacted by the Army token this round.
Before starting Endgame actions, you may trash 1 Payoff card available.
You may trash this card from your tableau for any 2 available Resource cards.
On your first turn in Endgame, you get 1 extra Action.
40 VPs for each Payoff you have played by endgame scoring.
You may not make any substitutions to play this card.
60 VP if you have Invested plus 10 VP for each Gold.
30 VP for each Wood, Sheep, and Grain
Take the total number of Glass and Silk you have. Square that number, then multiply it by 10 for VPs.
10 VP for each Soldier, +30 additional VP if you end the game with the most soldiers.
10 VP for each Building you've played
30/50/80 VP if you have 1/2/3 Thing-in-a-Set cards.
40 VP for each Clay, Stone, Carrot
50 VP if you have 4 Sheep. 50 VP if you have 3 Cattle.
All Blockers must be paid by the end of this turn. Initiate Endgame.
Can be stolen by any player on their turn if they trash 1 of any Resource.
To trash this card, place 3 Food or equivalent on this card in a single turn before Endgame. Trash the food. This does not cost an action, and cannot be part of a chain.
